plants.name: Buto-Bato
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Paano nagagawa ng isang halaman na tumubo at magbato ng maraming gisante ng mabilis? Ang sagot ni Buto-Bato, "Kasipagan, komitment, at malusog, balanseng agahan ng sikat ng araw at mataas na fiber ng karbon daluksad ang nakatulong para ito ay maging posible."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Mirasol
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Hindi mapigilan ni Mirasol tumalbog sa pintig ng tiyempo. Anong pintig yon? Edi yung nagbibigay-buhay na ritmo ng mundo, pumipintig sa prikwensyang naririnig lamang ni Mirasol.  </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!

<color=black>Produksyon ng Araw: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Serisabog
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Parang gusto kong sumabog!" sabi ni Sarisa #1. "Huwag, dapat sabay tayo magpasabog!" sabi naman ng kaniyang kapatid, Sarisa #2. Matapos ang matinding balitaktakan, sila ay nagpasabog.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator)</color></size>

plants.name: ManiWall
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>“Maraming nagtatanong kung ano ang pakiramdam ko kapag palaging nginangata ng zombies,” sabi ni ______. “Ang hindi nila alam, sa limitado kong pakiramdam, parang kiliti lang 'yun—parang nakakarelaks na masahe sa likod.” </color></size> (unfinished)
plants.info:
<size=36>Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color></size>

plants.name: Potato Mine
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>May nagsasabi na tamad si Potato Mine, na palaging sa huling sandali siya kumikilos. Wala siyang sinasabi. Abala siya sa pag-iisip tungkol sa kanyang investment strategy.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Potato Mines pack a powerful punch, but they need a while to arm themselves. You should plant them ahead of zombies. They will explode on contact.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Sinaglamon
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Halos makakuha na ng stunt gig si Chomper para sa Dilim ng Lagim, pero naudlot ito nang masyadong mataas ang hininging bayad ng kanyang ahente sa simula pa lang. Hindi naman siya nagtatanim ng sama ng loob. Sabi niya, bahagi lang talaga 'yan ng negosyo.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but they are vulnerable while chewing.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Ipip
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Kamakailan ko lang namalayan ang pag-iral ng mga zombies" sabi ni Ipip. "Tulad ng ibang mga kabute, iisipin ko lang na ito ay alamat o mga monster na nakikita lamang sa mga palabas. Lahat ng ito ay talagang nakamumulat-matang karanasan para sa akin."  </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Puff-shrooms are cheap, but can only fire a short distance.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can stack up to three times.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Asbok
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I was in a dead-end job producing yeast spores for a bakery," says Fume-shroom. "Then Puff-shroom, bless 'im, told me about this great opportunity blasting zombies. Now I really feel like I'm making a difference."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through screen doors.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can pierce through.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Hipno
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Kaibigan natin ang mga zombies," giit ni Kabuteng-Hipno. "Sila'y mga nilalang na labis na hindi nauunawaan at may mahalagang papel sa ating kapaligiran. Kaya natin at dapat pa nga nating gawin ang higit upang maipaliwanag sa kanila ang ating pananaw."  </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>When eaten, Hypno-shrooms will make a zombie turn around and fight for you.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Makes a single zombie fight for you.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Takot
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sino 'yan?" bulong ni Kabuteng-Takot, na ang boses ay bahagyang nauulinigan. "Umalis ka! Wala akong gustong makita. Maliban sa lalaking taga-perya." </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Scaredy-shrooms are long-ranged shooters that hide when enemies get near them.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Yelo
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nakasimangot si Kabuteng-Yelo, hindi dahil siya ay malungkot o hindi sumasang-ayon, kundi dahil sa aksidente noong siya ay bata pa na nagresulta ng kaniyang pagkaparalisa.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ice-shrooms temporarily immobilize all zombies on the screen.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Freezes all zombies in place.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuboom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Swerte kayo kasama niyo ko," ani ni Kabuboom. :Sa isa kong putok, lahat bubulusok. Di' mahirap diba?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Doom-shrooms destroy everything in a large area and leave a crater that can't be planted on.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Leaves a crater.</color></size>

plants.name: Patungang Liryo
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Hindi kailanman nagrereklamo si Patungang Liryo. Hindi siya interesado sa kung anong nangyayari. Kung may halaman na ilagay sa ibabaw ni Patungang Liryo, hindi siya magsasalita. May mga nakakagulat ba siyang opinyon o mga lihim? Walang nakakaalam. Lahat ng 'yon, tinatago ni Lily Pad.</color></size>
plants.info: Lily Pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them. Kakayahan: Non-aquatic plants can be planted on it. When specific plants are placed, Lily Pad transforms into a variant of it that can automatically plant the plant that transformed it every 90 seconds.

plants.name: Kalamugin
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Handa nako!", isinigaw ni Squash. "Tara na ano! Ilagay nyo nako! Sino pabang pipiliin nyo? Ako na to! Ano na ano, ano pabang hinihintay nyo? Kailangan ko to!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Squashes will smash the first zombie that gets close to it.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Gisantres
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Handa nako!", isinigaw ni Squash. "Tara na ano! Ilagay nyo nako! Sino pabang pipiliin nyo? Ako na to! Ano na ano, ano pabang hinihintay nyo? Kailangan ko to!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*3/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Kaguluwan
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I'm totally invisible," Tangle Kelp thinks to himself. "I'll hide here just below the surface, and nobody will see me." His friends tell him they can see him perfectly well, but he'll never change.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that nears them underwater.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color></size>

plants.name: Labuyo
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"UGGGGHHHHH.... " sabi ni Labuyo. Hindi pa siya sasabog, oo, hindi pa ngayon. Pero malapit na. Malapit na siya. Sasabog na siya! Alam niya 'to, ramdam niya, buong buhay niya parang papunta na talaga sa pagkakataon na 'to.  </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jalapenos destroy an entire row of zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator)</color></size>

plants.name: Damong Talusok
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Hockey is Spikeweed's obsession. He's got box seat season tickets. He keeps close track of his favorite players. And he consistently cleans up in the office hockey pool. Just one problem: he's terrified of pucks.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spikeweeds pop tires and hurt any zombies that step on them

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Instakill Vehicle Zombies</color></size>

plants.name: Bagahoy
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Gusto at nirerespeto ng lahat si Bagahoy. Gusto nila siya dahil sa kaniyang integridad, kaniyang matatag na pakikipagkaibigan , at ang kaniyang kakayahan na higit na palakasin ang pinsala ni Buto-Bato. Ngunit may itinatagong lihim si Bagahoy. Hindi siya nakakabasa.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs that deal twice as much damage.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Ignites peas that pass through it, increasing their damage.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-dagat
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Hindi pa kailanman nakikita ni Sea-shroom ang dagat. Nasa pangalan niya, narinig na niya ang marami tungkol dito, pero hindi lang talaga siya nagkaroon ng oras. Balang araw, makikita niya rin ito.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sea-shrooms are aquatic plants that shoot short ranged spores.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Halampara
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Plantern defies science. He just does. Other plants eat light and excrete oxygen; Plantern eats darkness and excretes light. Plantern's cagey about how he does it. "I'm not gonna say 'sorcery,' I wouldn't use the term 'dark forces,' I just... I think I've said enough."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Planterns light up an area to let you see through fog, and give Lumos levels to plants.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Dispels the fog with light.</color>
<color=#99582a>Lumos System: </color><color=#8B0000>Provides 1 Lumos Level in a 3x3 Grid, which can be stacked to provide strength to other Lumos plants. Refer to its fusions for the list of affected plants.</color></size>

plants.name: Kaktus
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black> Tigsasin siya, oo, pero sa loob ng mga tinik ni Kaktus ay ang pusong malambot na puno ng pag-ibig at kabutihang-loob. Gusto lang niyang yumakap at yakapin. Karamihan ng tao ay hindi kayang makisama doon, pero hindi yun alintana kay Kaktus. Matagal na siyang may ka-date na armadilyo at mukhang okay naman sila.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cactuses shoot spikes that can hit both ground and air targets.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can attack flying zombies.</color></size>

plants.name: Bentilober
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>When Blover was five he got a shiny new birthday cake. Blover made his wish, huffed and puffed, but was able to extinguish only 60% of the candles. Instead of giving up, though, he's used that early defeat as a catalyst to push himself harder ever since.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blovers blow away all balloon zombies and fog, except Bucket-copter Zombies and Zomppelins.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Blows away fog and Balloon Zombies. Pushes back Zomppelins slightly.</color></size>

plants.name: Balimbing
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aw, man," says Starfruit. "I went to the dentist the other day, and he said that I have four cavities. I've got—count it—ONE tooth! Four cavities in one tooth? How does this happen?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Starfruits shoot stars in 5 directions.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*5/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Kalabasa
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Katatapos lang ni Kalabasa sa kaniyang part-time na trabaho. "Sa totoo lang, napakasayang experience 'yun," patawa niyang isinambit. "Pero sabihin niyo nga, bakit ba lagi nila akong nilalagyan ng kendi at kandila sa loob ko?" </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pumpkins protect plants that are within their shells.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Fusion Priority: </color><color=#8B0000>Lowest</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Balani
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Everyone wondered why Magnet-shroom always took so long to "digest" the iron he absorbed, even after it had already been taken away for fusion. Frustrated, he snapped, "I'm not lazy! I just got knocked out by flying iron!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Magnet-shrooms can absorb metallic objects.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can attract metal objects.</color>
If there is a magnetic plant in the 8-direction vicinity of another magnetic plant, they are then connected through the Magnetic System. The Magnetic System has no limit to its number of connections, and will boost the strength of some magnetic plants based on its amount. Refer to its fusions for the list of affected plants.</size>

plants.name: Repolyador
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Sabi nila ang pagmamahal ay parang repolyo; kailangan mong unti-unting balatan para makita ang nilalaman ng puso ng taong mahal mo. Ginawa iyan ni Repolyador, kaya nalaman niyang ang pagmamahal sa kaniya ay hindi totoo.  </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Launches cabbages to attack zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>40/3 Segundo</color>
<color=black>

plants.name: Maseterang Bulaklak
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants always think Flower Pot is just a "pot," but in reality, Flower Pot is a "flower" that just looks like a "pot." Look, that little sprout is the bud of a flower.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Allows planting plants above it.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Enables plants to be planted on rooftops.</color>

plants.name: Butilyador
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nagtataka ang mga halaman kung saan nanggagaling ang malagkit na mantikilya ni Butilyador. Kahit siya, 'di niya alam kung saan ito nanggagaling. Pero hindi iyon naging dahilan para ihinto niya ang paggawa ng popcorn gamit ito sa kaniyang libreng oras at madagdagan ang kaniyang kita.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Throws corn kernels to attack zombies and can also throw butter to immobilize them.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/3 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Has a 1/4 chance to throw butter, dealing 40 damage and immobilizing zombies for 4 seconds.<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Bawang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Garlic boasts of his high allicin content, claiming that eating garlic is good for health. Whether that's true or not, you only have to watch the zombies gagging as they chew on him to know it's pretty effective. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Any zombie that tries to bite it will switch lanes.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Zombies that bite it will change lanes. </color>

plants.name: Paragwas
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Minsa'y naging kilalang tagapasa ng bola si Paragwas at itinanghal na superstar sa ika-114 Plant-Zombie PBA. Ngunit habang siya ay tumatanda, siya'y unti-unting nakakalbo. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Deflects incoming basketballs.

<color=#3D1400>Resistensya: </color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can knock back basketballs within a 3×3 area.</color>

plants.name: Calendula
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Si Marie-gold ay napakayamang halaman, kaya naman waldas siya ng waldas ng kaniyang kayamanan - kahit na wala naman siyang dapat pagkagastusan. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Produces coins, silver coins, and diamonds.

<color=black>Production Interval: </color><color=#8B0000>25 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Coin Amount:
</color><color=#8B0000>75% Chance = 100 Coins
20% Chance = 300 Coins
5% Chance = 1000 Coins</color>

plants.name: Melonyador
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>During breaks, Melon-pult loves to split its melon arm into two, nibbling away to cool off. "Want a taste?" it asks the zombies cheerfully, while the plants around, sweltering in the heat, can only drool enviously.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Launches melons at zombies to deal damage.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>80/3 Segundo</color>

plants.name: Bladegrass
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>For plants, spinning petals without damaging their stems is a skillful art. Some botanists speculate that Bladegrass might be distantly related to Blover because of this ability. "It’s indeed a tricky skill," Bladegrass said with a faux-profound air, <page>"The real challenge lies in obtaining lightweight circular saws and painting them with petal patterns."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Damages zombies in close range with his spinning sawblades!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spins its blades when zombies approach, dealing 5 AOE damage every 0.02 seconds to nearby zombies.</color>

plants.name: Queen Endoflame
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The once-fiery little flower has grown into a master of sunlight production after enduring <page>hardships. Queen Endoflame no longer needs to get hurt to shine. The torch on her head has become her power, blazing like the sun. The shining flames keep passing on, creating one Endoflame after another.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blasts zombies to dusts with solar flares.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300x8/2 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Targets zombies across the screen. Projectiles drop sun upon hitting zombies and can be upgraded by passing through Infernowoods for x4 damage.<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Burger Blaster
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants often wonder about Burger Blaster's origins, especially when they see him stacking other plants on him to enhance his power. In truth, he’s just a byproduct of Dave's attempt to make a taco out of <page>plants. "Actual product may vary. Additional fillings are self-provided."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A gift from the Hybrid edition!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20x2/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Fires random projectiles. Upgrades by using Cactus, Melon-pult, and Winter Melon to reach the highest level. Go to the next page for info on the upgrades.<page>- Cactus Upgrade - Level: 0 → 1
HP: 1000 → 2000
Attack Interval: 3 → 2.5
Num. of Shots: 2 → 4
New Projectiles: Spike, Butter, Squash

- Melon-pult Upgrade - Level: 1 → 2
HP: 2000 → 3000
Attack Damage: 30 → 40
Num. of Shots: 4 → 6
New Projectiles: Hot Melon, Melon<page>- Winter Melon Upgrade - Level: 2 → 3
HP: 3000 → 4000
Attack Interval: 2.5 → 2
Num. of Shots: 6 → 8
New Projectiles: Winter Melon, Snow Pea, Snow Spore, Doom Icicle<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Jicamagic
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I'm a grand magician to rival the great Imitator," proclaimed Jicamagic. However, only his good friend, Imitator, knows the truth: Jicamagic and Dr. Edgar used to study life sciences in the same class.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Catalyst for Titan fusions.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>A fusion catalyst for Titan plants. Place it on the middle plant to start the fusion.<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Manggagaya
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I remember the Zombie Wars back in '76', says Imitater in a raspy, old-man's voice, 'Back then, we didn't have all these fancy peashooters and jalapenos. All we had was guts. Guts and a spoon.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Imitator can make copies of your plants!

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Plant Imitator on a plant or fusion to receive a free seed packet of that plant, cannot imitate pots, pads, pumpkins or drones.</color>

plants.name: Kalapusa
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>The grace of a cat and the clumsiness of a squash make a unique kind of beauty, Cat-Squash murmurs. Once I master both, I'll stir things up on this lawn. She adjusts her hat and locks eyes on an unsuspecting zombie nearby.</color>
plants.info:
<size=33>Super Nyanko, Neko Squash!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Drops itself if she doesn't hit anything. For each zombie crushed, a Squash seed packet is dropped, up to a maximum of 3. Crushing 3 or more zombies will drop an additional Spicy Squash seed packet.</color>

plants.name: Eskrimador na Balimbing
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>"I have fought across 3,000 miles of battlefield, my blade halting millions in their tracks." The Swordmaster Starfruit, a lover of fine drinks and poetry, takes great pride in his impeccable cosplay skills. With a sly smile, he adds, "My sword never bleeds, for it is merely a decoration."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=31>A guest from afar, I think you will want to become friends.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>200*5+30*20/6 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack unleashes 5 swords that pierce infinitely, dealing 200 damage each. Additionally, it inflicts 600 damage to all zombies within the surrounding grid, repeating this 20 times.</color></size>

plants.name: Regalong Sombi
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Introducing the Zombie Giftbox—the zombies' entry point into the world of finance. As a high-risk financial product, it comes equipped with a reminder: "Investing carries inherent risks; proceed with caution. Sponsored by Dr. Yan Wang." This vital information is cleverly tucked inside the box lid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Earn 100 Sun, but spawns a Gold-box Zombie.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns a Golden Mystery-box Zombie.</color></size>

plants.name: Giant-nut Spawn
plants.introduce:
<size=30><color=black>阳光父子坚果说付我500阳光，让我帮他个忙，所以我来了。能难到哪里去呢？总不可能是冲进僵尸堆里吧？</color></size>

"Sunshine Father and Son Nuts said they would pay me 500 sunshine to help them with something, so here I am. How hard could it be? It’s not like I’ll have to charge into a pile of zombies, right?"
plants.info:
<size=30>碾压僵尸。

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Babaeng Lampakameow
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Cats are usually afraid of water, but I'm a magical cat girl, so I'm not afraid." she said enthusiastically, and the other cats looked at her with admiration. Actually, she absolutely loves water, and she said this to make herself stand out.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The Cattail Girl will automatically attack all zombies that appear on the map.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>40*2/1.5 Segundo</color></size>

plants.name: Sebada
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Barley calls itself a generalist, but other plants think of it as just a bit player — "After all, other plants always do the work, don't they?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Barley can transform into any basic, fused, or ultimate plant.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Transforms into a random plant every 30 seconds.</color></size>

plants.name: Panandaliang Liyab
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>It is said that small flowers like her would never dream of producing Sun — the Endoflame was originally going to apply for the position of Sunflower, but she realized that her light would only shine when she is being destroyed. Everyone says that the flame at the top of her head is the brightest, but she knows that her fiery eyes of determination is the source of her strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>The Endoflame can absorb projectiles and produce Sun.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Each projectile reduces toughness by 50 and produce 25 Sun. Produces a Fertilizer upon death.</color></size>

plants.name: Malaking Mani
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I am invincible on the battlefield, and my partners can't take their eyes off my majestic figure!" the Giant-nut boasted. "One year after getting kicked out of the Wall-nut Tumbler Club, I finally found a job that truly suits me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Giant-nut will roll forward and knock down any zombies it encounters.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Rolls down the lane, killing all the zombies on its path.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Regalong Halaman
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>No one quite understands why the Plant Giftbox fights alongside the plants against the zombies. He doesn't look like a plant at all, yet he seems to know every plant's abilities inside and out. "Actually, I'm just a college student who loves video games," he admits with a grin. "The professor mentioned extra credit, so here I am."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>The Plant Giftbox can be planted to produce random plants or fusions.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>When placed on soil or on a Lily Pad, produces a random plant. Placing it on top of an eligible plant can produce a random fusion.</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng Emperatris
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Empress-shroom holds great affection for her zombie subordinates. "They contributed significantly to my rise as an Empress," she expressed. Unfortunately, these powerful zombies instill fear in other plants, something Empress-shroom is completely unaware of.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Summons zombies that will fight for you

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Randomly selects 1 of the following zombies to summon:
Rugby-nut Zombie | Cherryshooter Newspaper Zombie | Zomboni | Scholar Zombie</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypno-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Summon Interval → 10 Segundo | Enchantress-shroom Sub-species Unlocked
2. Can now summon Ultimate Zombies</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling Serisabog
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I'm not sure why the Gatling Pea has so many fans. My brother and I can fire four bullets too," Gatling Cherrybomber remarked enviously. However, the truth is that everyone appreciates Gatling Pea for his kindness and outstanding culinary talents.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gatling Cherrybomber is the strongest damage-dealer on land.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>300*4/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Gatling Cherry + Explod-o-shooter</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Cherry bomb bullets now deal 3x more DMG
2. Attack Interval → 1 Second</color></size>

plants.name: Kalamuging Alab-kahoy
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Squashed Infernowood has a high opinion of himself, but other plants regard him with disdain, particularly those in the pea family. "He's too picky! He possesses such strong power, yet it only benefits cherries," they say. This infuriates Squashed Infernowood. "I'm just allergic to peas…"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Spawns a Spicy Squash for every 20 cherries that pass through.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry bomb bullets that pass through it become bouncing spicy squashes that explode after every bounce. After 20 of such bullets have passed, spawn a Spicy Squash in front.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Infernowood + Spicy Squash</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Bullets required for Spicy Squash → 10
2. Now spawns two Spicy Squash</color></size>

plants.name: Serizilla
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Cherrizilla proudly says, "Many envy my dinosaur-like hairstyle." As a public figure, he's mindful of his image: "Spitting cherries and eating zombies is gross, but it's my duty."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Cherrizilla is the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Chomping zombies restores 1000 Toughness, deal a 1000 damage, and spits out exploding cherries. Zombies with HP < 2000 will be insta-killed and restore full Toughness to Cherrizilla. Repels vehicles back, receiving at most 1/3 of its maximum Toughness. Loses 10% of max HP if current HP exceeds max.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Chewzilla + Cherry Chomper</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Can now kill zombies with less health than itself
2. 200% healing bonus and zombie damage is capped at 500</color></size>

plants.name: Masasakuping KaBOOMte
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Would Death employ a fashionista? Doominator-shroom had no idea, but after noticing that he couldn't consistently frighten zombies, he turned to Hypno-shroom for some costume suggestions. Although people might not favor Death, how would they react if he wore sparkling ice wings?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Doominator-shroom deals immense damage, simultaneously charming and slowing down zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>120/0.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Has a chance to charm zombies with HP < 50%, creating an explosion in the grid where the charmed zombie is located with thrice the normal damage.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Doomberg-shroom + Frostveil-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Fumes now deal 3x more DMG
2. Increased Freezing speed by 3 times</color></size>

plants.name: Maning Kambal-Solar
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Twin Solar-nut, a photosynthesis master, revolutionized light energy-mass conversion, minimizing energy loss through recycling. He humbly credits the pioneers: "I'm just standing on the shoulders of giants."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Twin Solar-nut produces Sun every time it is injured.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Regardless of the damage type, each attack on it will only reduce 50 Toughness. Produces 15 Sun after every hit. Clicking on it consumes 500 Sun, causes a Giant-nut to come rolling down, and restores 1500 Toughness.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>(Sunflower + Wall-nut) + Wall-nut</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Restore full Toughness instead
2. Toughness reduced per hit → 10</color></size>

plants.name: Obsidiyamo
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After being baptized by fire and ice, Spikesidian became as hard as steel, but its temperament also became erratic. This change is likely due to the steel that condensed in its mouth, making it reluctant to speak.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spikesidian can deal immense damage while also tanking multiple tires.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>6000</color>
<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>100*2/1 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Spikecicle + Spikinferno</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Damage multiplied by 5
2. Gains 95% DMG Reduction</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling na Kaboom
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Gatling Doom is dangerous and should not be approached. It is a forbidden force in the world." Despite the frightening tales circulating among the plants, Gatling Doom is not as it seems. In fact, it is one of the friendliest plants. However, the zombies turned to ashes would disagree.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Destruction incarnate. Fires rounds of destruction unlucky enough to face its wrath.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>300*4/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Fires a bullet of doom that deals 1800 damage once every 4 round of bullets. Each bullet will splash damage over a large area.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Gatling Pea + Doom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. No more rest between every attack
2. Can now fire bullets of doom every round</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling na Yelohing Kabute
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>The little puff-shrooms who once shouted, "We are going to join the army!" have matured into veterans with resolute eyes. Wherever and whenever, the Gatling Icicle-shroom Company is committed to ensuring that the mission is accomplished.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Can be stacked three times to shoot 12 icicles at once!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4*3/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 5 Cryo Points. Icicles deal 4 times more damage to frozen enemies. Each icicle can pierce 3 times.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Gatling Snow (In Order)</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Increased icicles' penetration to 10 times
2. Increased damage to Frozen zombies by 10x</color></size>

plants.name: Bituing Magneto
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>No one knows where Magnetar is from, but one thing's for sure: He was not responsible for the dinosaurs. Not at all!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Why the heck is there a meteor on my lawn!?

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>25*5/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=#99582a>Lumos System: </color><color=#8B0000>+20 Damage per Lumos Level.</color>
<color=#495057>Magnetic System: </color><color=#8B0000>+5% Damage per Magnetic Plant.
<color=#6A0C9D>Both systems can increase the damage of the stars by upto 300, maximum.</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Summons a meteor every 20 seconds, dealing 1800 damage upon impact. Splits into multiple stars that home in on zombies and deal 100 damage each.</color></color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Stardrop + Magnethorn</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Attack Interval → 0.5 Segundo
2. Base damage is doubled and limiter (120) is removed</color></size>

plants.name: Paglumong Kabloomte
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Nuclear deterrence is beneficial. Someday, the zombies will stop their assaults out of fear of my formidable self-detonation," Oblivion-shroom asserted with confidence. Yet, it was evident that Oblivion-shroom failed to understand that zombies wouldn't initiate a Cold War just because they were hit with cold air.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Sprays deadly fumes all around, bringing ultimate destruction. Beware!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>(100+100*8)*4/1.9 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Damage Range: </color><color=#8B0000>5*5</color>
<color=black>Search Range: </color><color=#8B0000>5*3</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Doomberg-shroom + Snowgloom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Damage on death → 1,000,000
2. Now absorbs explosion damage. When 10,000 damage is absorbed, a Doom-shroom explosion is released</color></size>

plants.name: Kalabasang Leyser
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Magnet-shroom's power remains unmatched," said Laser Pumpkin. "After all, composite armor, electromagnetic catapults, and plasma guns came nearly a century after aircraft carriers." Other plants envied Laser Pumpkin's high-tech gear, but only Magnet-shroom knew his power came from a Magnetar meteorite.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Spawns laser drones that home in on enemies.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Always has a Laser Drone wingman with him when he appears. Generates a Laser Drone on top of a 3x3 grid regularly.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Bloverthorn Pumpkin + Magblover</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Wingmen Amount → 3
2. Inherits Joker Pumpkin's effects when in the same Magnetic System | Blast Pumpkin Sub-species Unlocked</color></size>

plants.name: Imbubuyoging Leyser
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>感谢究极杨桃，现在我们有一整套新装备了！看看这些新奇玩意，复合装甲，电磁高速螺旋桨，还有等离子机炮......等等！不！我最喜欢的花瓶！</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>激光无人机可以发射激光穿透攻击。

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>200/1.5 Segundo (作为植物) 200/1 Segundo(作为僚机)</color></size>

plants.name: Obsidiyanong Mani
plants.introduce: <size=29><color=black>Rather than seeking his best friend's protection, this plant prefers to protect him. With a hard, gem-like body and steadfast gaze, he's forged by the Obsidian-nut's soul, enduring trials of ice and fire. Though his body may wear down one day, he's determined to keep other plants safe.</color></size></size>
plants.info:
<size=29>The Obsidian-nut has four times the defense of a normal Tall-Nut.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Restores 1500 HP every 15 seconds. Resists being run over by a car, taking a maximum of 200 damage each time. When one Obsidian-nut receives damage it is shared and divided among all Obsidian-nuts on the lawn.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Frost-nut + Scorch-nut</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Recovers 10,000 Toughness when affected by Ice-shrooms. Full Toughness if Jalapeno
2. Damage mitigation for the two plants on its left and right</color></size>

plants.name: Lantarador
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After overcoming past struggles, Wither-pult now aims for a calm life. "All I want now is to watch classic movies and live in peace."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Capable of rapid, spread-fire volleys of projectiles.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>120/2 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>42% chance of rapid-firing. Has an equal chance to spread-fire in a number equal to the number of zombies in its lane. Projectiles split into garlic, corn, and melon upon impact.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Salad-pult + Garlic-pult</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Spread-fire is now guaranteed
2. Melon Pot's traits are now inherited</color>

plants.name: Maislumong Kanyon
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Clad in icy armor and dark as a warning, each shot from Cob-livion Cannon brings destruction. Zombies hit by it need not prepare—nothing will remain after the flash.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Possesses earth-shattering power.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>Main Blast - 1800 in a 3x3 area. Additional 1800 + 30% of Zombies' max HP across the entire screen. Side gun: 360*2/1.5 Segundo with Slow </color>
<color=black>Arming Time: </color><color=#8B0000>36 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Cryo Cannon + Cryodoom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Main Blast damage is multiplied by 4
2. Reload Time → 12 Segundo</color>

plants.name: Paragwas ni Midas
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>From its appearance, you can tell that Midas Umbrella has a knack for business. "That's right, my hat of emerald was a trade item I exchanged with someone from a place full of blocks..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=30>A combination of Alchemist Umbrella and Umbrella Kale.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Has the traits of both its materials. Also allows projectiles to hit zombies in the two rows below. Its Coffee Bean ultimate can instantly kill zombies below 50% health.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Alchemist Umbrella + Umbrella Kale</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Projectiles will continuously bounce along other Midas Umbrella until the last one. Each bounce increases projectile damage by 1.8x.
2. Activates ultimate automatically if zombies are near. 7.5 seconds cooldown | Aegis Umbrella Sub-species Unlocked</color>

plants.name: Engkantadang-Kabute
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>The subjects of the Empress-shroom are captivated by the Enchantress-shroom’s mysterious power. She’s not just my advisor; she's the force that keeps our kingdom thriving. Her magic isn't just powerful—it's explosive, the Empress-shroom declared. In truth, the Enchantress-shroom simply delights in blowing up any unruly dissenters who dare resist her charm.</color>
plants.info:
<size=31>Summons Gatling Cherry Newspaper zombies to fight for you.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>The same as Empress-shroom, but only summons Gatling Cherry Newspaper zombies. Benefits from Empress-shroom buffs and immediately summons when an Empress-shroom dies in a 3*3 radius, Empress-shroom too when a nearby Enchantress-shroom dies.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Empress-shroom + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: Abong Ginisantres
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The flames consume his broken body, each breath a torment, yet the Ashen Threepeater stands tall. He believes the fire within will achieve eternal glory in one final, grand explosion.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ashen Threepeater awaits his rebirth.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Loses attack capabilities after being thoroughly burnt.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Scorched Threepeater + Jalapeno</color>

plants.name: Adarnang Ginisantres
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>No one knows if fire truly brings rebirth to plants—it’s just a legend. Those who chased it turned to ash, until he became the new legend. I don’t know how many times I must endure the flames to succeed, but for them, I have to.</color>
plants.info:
<size=32>From fire reborn!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>160x3/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Torches the whole lawn on entry, projectiles inflict Enflamed debuff, pierce three times with damage doubled after passing Squashed Infernowood.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Ashen Threepeater + Jalapeno</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Enflamed damage multiplier → 150%, and ignited peas can now inflict the debuff
2. Bullets can now pierce infinitely</color>

plants.name: Gravitron
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The Gravitron has mastered electromagnetism with Magnetar. "It's not rocket science—left-hand force, right-hand electricity", it boasted. "And don’t forget the moving magnet—trust the smartest plant around!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gravitron pulls stars, accelerates them and launches at zombies at max force.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Storage Limit - 60, Acceleration Time - 1.5 Segundo, Damage - thrice</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Magnetar + Blover</color>

plants.name: Garlizilla
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Dressed in plain clothes with a gaudy gold tooth, one word from him sends others fleeing. 'Garlick me, I've had enough of the spotlight. Standing out doesn't suit me anymore—I just want a quiet, simple life.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cousin to the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>A Cherrizilla variant that no longer heals from cherry explosions, inherits garlic properties, and shoots projectiles that poison zombies. Can be switched to Cherrizilla with a Cherry Bomb and vice versa with a Garlic. Unlocked alongside Cherrizilla.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherrizilla + Garlic</color>

plants.name: Kalasabog
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cherry? Pumpkin? Or a hybrid born of fusion? The Blast Pumpkin doesn’t bother with such details. For him, Halloween is all about handing out juicy cherries to the good kids and cherry bombs to the naughty ones—nothing else matters. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blast-proof pumpkin.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>No longer spawns hover drones, immune to cherry explosions and heals from them. Every 30 seconds spawns a self-destructing drone that seeks out zombies and explodes like a Cherry Bomb.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Laser Pumpkin + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: Paragwas ng Pagtanggol
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Many question the relationship between Midas Umbrella and Aegis Umbrella. 'We’re brothers!' Aegis confidently declares, thumping its canopy. 'My dear elder brother is just going through a rough patch emotionally.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Reflects projectiles from zombies.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>A variant of the Midas Umbrella. You can switch between the two with Melon-pults and Cabbage-pults. Aegis loses the ability to buff lobbed projectiles but now gains a 90% Damage Reduction and can reflect zombie projectiles.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Midas Umbrella + Melon-pult</color>

plants.name: Charmatron-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black></color>
plants.info:
<size=34>Charisma maxima.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>80/2 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Projectiles have a 1-tile splash radius with no falloff, cannot be consumed by zombies. Feeding it metal objects grants 1 charge level for 30 seconds, up to 2 charges. At 1 charge level, it fires 2 shots per attack and 2 charge level, 4 shots. Each plant in the same Magnetic System provides a 5% damage boost to its shots.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Charm-shroom + Charm Magnet</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1.Charm HP threshold increased from 50% to 100%
2. Now always in a fully-charged state | Attack Interval → 1 Second</color>

plants.name: Obsidian-mine
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Obsidian-mine possesses immense power despite its size. He fears no zombies. However, it has its troubles, as block people with diamond pickaxes often come to knock on its head.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Has extremely high toughness and can block Diggers.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Obsidian-nut. You can switch between the two with Potato Mine or Tall-nut. Blocks Digger Zombies and release a small potato-nut explosion for every 1000 damage received (before damage reduction), dealing 500 damage to zombies in a small area.<size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Magicat Nettle
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I think it's better to use animal hair to keep myself above water than relying on, for example, a swim ring!" Magicat Nettle stands by her belief. Hmm... If you think this is due to her poor academic skills and inability to stay afloat on the river, you're right. How could a cat possibly swim! Though she refuses to be categorized randomly.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons drones to attack every time she defeats a zombie.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>160x2/1.5 Seconds, for each zombie killed summons a small floating drone on the same row, firing 30 nettle spikes with 100 damage each.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>The more zombies there are, the fewer zombies there will be (inherits Neko Squash's trait of refunding cards upon zombie kills)</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Basic Attack Damage x5.
2. Drone Attack Damage x3.</color><size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Titan Apeacalypse Turret
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Titan Apeacalypse Turret rarely interacts with people. It's not due to arrogance, but because people keep asking whether the fire on his body is hot or cold, and whether he can <page>create hot ice or cold fire. These questions bore him.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Consumes HP to fire obsidian pelts that knock back enemies and becomes stronger the longer he shoots.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>120 per shot</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Shots knock back zombies and pierce twice, with power halved per pierce. Fires faster as HP decreases and reaches maximum speed when below 1/3 HP. If HP is further reduced, attack damage increases. Damage is capped at 480 at 0 HP. <page>Each shot fired inflict 50 self-damage until HP is reduced to 1500. </color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Defense increases as HP decreases. Below 100 health, it becomes immune to damage under 100.
2. Increases projectile damage and knockback significantly.</color><size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Calamity-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Everyone wonders how Calamity-shroom subdues massive creatures to serve her. Endless destruction should bring silence... When questioned, she sits alone atop a tower, sipping her dreamy brew: "Oblivion? No, I simply grant them rebirth within illusions."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turn the tide of battle!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Charms zombies in range (same as Doom-shroom) and makes them explode upon death, dealing damage like Doom-shroom.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Doom-shroom explosions now leave no craters.
2. Summons 3 charmed Armored Gargantuars upon explosion. Each charmed zombie summons a Zomboni too.</color><size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Gatling Sunburst-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Production is also part of the fight!" said Gatling Sunburst-shroom, wiping its sweat. Its platoon has been reorganized into the 'Sunshine Bay Construction Corps,' but their fighting spirit remains undiminished.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates a large amount of sun for you.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20x4x3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Gatling Icicle-shroom. You can switch between the two with Ice-shroom or Sunflower. Shots no longer slow but instead drop 5 sun on hitting the 1st and 2nd zombies. Each subsequent pierce deals double the damage but requires 5 sun per hit. Synergizes with the sun value doubling Odyssey Modifier and dropped suns are worth 15 each when the effect is active.</color><size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Gatling Frenzy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Compared to the composed demeanor of Gatling Doom, Gatling Frenzy-shroom has a much shorter temper, especially when someone calls her a "Gray Egg". She often yells "Quietus!" and charges into the fray.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Continuously fires Doom-shroom attacks at zombies.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300, attack interval shortens by 0.1 seconds per attack, to a minimum of 0.5 seconds.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Gatling Doom. You can switch between the two with Peashooter or Scaredy-shroom. Fires a large bullet of doom every 16 attacks, dealing 1800 damage. When the "bullets of doom every round" effect is active, fires a large bullet of doom every 4 attacks and explodes when zombies are near regardless of attack speed.</color><size=36><color=black>

plants.name: Pea Sunflower
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Actually, the Sunflower behind me is my sister," Peashooter explained to everyone. "We've been inseparable since birth. She loves producing Sun, and I destroy zombies on her behalf." But everyone knows the truth: the cheerful Pea brother is a total siscon. After all, every zombie that gets near his sister mysteriously ends up vaporized by sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea Sunflower can fire Sun Bullets which produce Sun.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>100/5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Bullets drop 5 Sun when hitting zombies.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Cherryshooter
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"You think I have red-hot anger issues? Me? Bah! You're red and hot! Your whole family is red!" Cherryshooter despised being teased about the color of his head. But the jokes didn't last long. It was just a happy incident. After eating special cherries, Peashooter found himself turning red and hot, and surprisingly, he could shoot cherries.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherryshooter fires powerful cherries.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>60/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Bombang Solar
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"So… it's obvious… we are Pretty Cure, aren't we?" The two Sunflower sisters tried to suppress their excitement. "The world needs us to save it!" Their passion bubbled over as they shouted together, "Light! Illuminate this land!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Bomb can produce Sun after killing zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Produces 25 Sun for each zombie killed in the explosion.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Seri-Mani
plants.introduce: <size=35><color=black>"I heard some zombies grumbling about their inability to eat cherries. Well, here I am!" The cheerful Cherry Nut shook the leaves atop his head, boasting about his pure cherry flavor. "But first, you have to promise me something: when you have cherries, share a bit with me. In fact, just give me everything you've got! I was born for this!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=35>Cherry-nut can absorb explosion damage and restore toughness.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Absorbs Cherry explosion damage to restore toughness. (From Ally: 25, From Enemy: 200)</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry Bomb + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Mani
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"No... don't call me ugly, or else... wait... I'll spray you." Pea-nut has always struggled with his "unique" appearance. But he firmly believes that what's inside a plant matters more than how it looks. Seeking guidance, he humbly asked senior Bowling Nut for advice and eventually mastered the technique of rolling nuts like bowling balls.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea-nut fire mini-nuts that can penetrate zombies.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Sabog-de-Bato
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Meet Explod-o-shooter, the ultimate plant killer. He's more irritable than ever—who would've thought the warm and friendly Cherryshooter would swallow another special cherry? Don't push your luck with him. That cherry stuck in his throat might just be his next shot—his face is already turning red!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The cherries fired by Explod-o-shooter will cause area explosion damage. He's also immune to cherry explosion.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Maning Araw
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Solar-nut always sees himself as an angel, blissfully unaware that the other plants often talk behind his back. "You know, if he adds a few black lines, he'd look exactly like a bee!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar-nut produce Sun while protecting your plants.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Produksyon ng Araw: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Minantes
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pea Mine may not have eyes, but he has his own special way of sensing zombies. "I feel it…" he murmured, "The zombies are getting closer… closer… closer…" Pea Mine's heartbeat quickened, and so did his firing speed. Faster, faster… until, with a "bang," Pea Mine exploded into a burst of potato-flavored fireworks.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea Mine can attack before unearthing.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Attacks faster as zombies get closer. Upon exploding, releases 36 projectiles in all directions.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Seri-sarisabog
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cherrypeater lives by the motto "good things come in pairs." Whether it's fighting zombies or handing out presents, he does it all in twos. "But come on," Repeater teased, "those cherries of yours aren't even close to ripe."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherrypeater can fire two cherries at a time.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>60*2/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Repeater + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: AraMina
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Stop at red lights, slow down at yellow lights, and obey traffic rules!" Solar Mine frequently warns zombies. But to the zombies, all they see is the disgusting green hue before them. He clutches his green leaves and pouts, wishing for more sunshine. "After all, sunshine is what fuels us all!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Mine produces Sun until and after its explosion.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Produksyon ng Araw: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Minamani
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Once seen as small and weak, Mine-nut now stood tall and strong, boasting a pair of big eyes and firm flesh. Yet beneath that sturdy exterior, he felt fragile and feared shrinking back to his former size. The zombies quipped, "If you take another bite, you'll explode!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mine-nut can explode while being eaten and once when broken.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>500 / Explosion, 1800 / Death</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Sinag-Bato
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Chomper has always envied Chomp-shooter's ability to spit out zombie remains, and he's tried to learn the trick more than once. Little did he know, though, that the secret wasn't a special skill—it was just that Chomp-shooter's mouth was slightly deformed, causing bits of zombie to leak out while chewing.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Chomp-shooter can fire parts after biting.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Spits out rolling zombie parts after biting that deals 80 damage.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Sinag-Mani
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>As a young plant, Chomp-nut was notoriously picky about food, never swallowing zombies in one bite, which frustrated its parents. After much persuasion, Chomp-nut finally learned to consume zombies whole, just like its predecessors. "I'm not picky! I just want to imitate how zombies eat. I should try something new, right? It's definitely not because I don't have a neck!" Chomp-nut said while chewing on a zombie.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Chomp-nut can restore toughness after eating zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Ngatngazilla
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Chewzilla savors every meal, despite his smaller mouth. "Big mouths are sloppy and don't hit the gym; they fall apart on the front line," he scoffs. "I only eat the essence of zombie meat and spit out the rest," he grins, though his backyard is filling up with leftovers.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Chewzilla can both be a bulwark and fierce attacker.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Eating zombies restores 200 Toughness and deals 200 Damage while spitting out rolling zombie parts that inflict 80 Damage and pierce infinitely. Zombies with HP < 500 and no armor are instantly killed, restoring 400 Toughness and spitting out rolling zombie parts.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Sinag-Araw
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Everyone was curious about how Solar Chomper transformed the zombies it devoured into sunlight, but it always hesitated to share its secret. One day, Sunflower discovered that her chlorophyll content had significantly diminished, revealing the truth: it wasn't actually turning zombies into sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Chomper can produce Sun after swallowing zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Produces 100 Sun after swallowing zombies.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Minangatgat
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Delicious and enticing, Potato Mines taste just like self-heating mashed potatoes, earning rave reviews from zombies. Among them, fries take the top spot in popularity. As zombies flock to the tantalizing aroma of French fries, they have no idea they're also indulging in tasty potato chips. "Just wait and see," Chomp-mine said with a mouthful, "Their nutrients will soon become new mines."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>After swallowing a zombie, the Chomp-mine will grow Potato Mines in front.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Plants a Potato Mine in front of it upon swallowing a zombie.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Potato Mine + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Serisinag
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ever since her drink with Cherry Bomb, Chomper has been constantly "buzzing." She turned into an absolute menace every meal. The sound of chewing transformed into explosive pops as plates and bowls flew everywhere, leaving everyone unwilling to dine with her. After a show of hands, Cherry Chomper ended up eating in the yard… at least she no longer has to buy new tableware.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Produces a cherry explosion upon eating a zombie.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill + 1800 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Creates a Cherry explosion in a 3x3 grid when biting.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry Bomb + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Sarisang Gatling
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Gatling Cherry's barrel was always red hot. He assured everyone that it was preheated to ensure faster firing. Everyone bought the story—until they caught him eating special cherries without even removing the barrel.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherryshooter's final form!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>60*4/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Gatling Pea + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name:
Kabuteng-Gisante/
Kabusante
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Don't let my size fool you; even a small body can contain a lot of energy," Pea-shroom cautions those who underestimate him. "We all began as tiny mushrooms, making progress a little at a time. With dedication to a sunny breakfast, you can become just like me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea-shroom shoot further than Puff-shroom.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Peashooter (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Ginigisante
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Who am I? The double-shot holds the answer!" exclaims the little Repeat-shroom, proudly flaunting the twin leaves atop its head. With double the firing rate and double the cheer, these spirited beings thrive in groups, eagerly pouring their firepower onto the battlefield, showcasing that size doesn't define their strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Repeat-shroom can fire two small peas at a time.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Peashooter * 2</color></size>

plants.name: BinaToro
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I embody the spirit of my ancestors; I will not fall here!" Buckshooter asserted confidently to anyone who crossed his path. When it was pointed out that his helmet resembled one stolen from the Buckethead Zombie, he countered, "Then let us invoke their will and ride the winds and waves once more!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Buckshooter has the ability to crack armor.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>80/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Knocks back on contact. Deals immense damage to Iron Zombies, and break iron doors.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Bucket</color></size>

plants.name: Maning-Kabuti
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nut or mushroom? Why worry about labels? Nut-shroom isn't about to tell you it's actually a matsutake in disguise anyway.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nut-shroom can be your stalwart defender despite its size.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Wall-nut (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Munting Kabuting-hypno
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"As a kid, I believed zombies were nothing more than fairy tale monsters," Mini Hypno-shroom said softly. "Now, don't get it twisted—I'm just restoring them to the fairy tale form they were always supposed to have."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shrinks a zombie and makes it fight for you!

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Makes a zombie smaller (cuts Health in half) and fight for you.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Hypno-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Gisanteng Pabango
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>The colorful Perfume-shroom makes a grand debut! With a blast of perfume, it can turn zombies around in an instant. Some claim it's a secret technique passed down by the mushroom family, while others believe it's a cutting-edge military weapon. Perfume-shroom just smiles and says, "It's all thanks to Hypno-shroom helping me rinse my mouth everyday."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Perfume-shroom spray fumes that can charm zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Chance to charm zombies with <50% Health. Hypnotizes the zombie that eats it.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Guni-Guni
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Scaredy-shroom has always been afraid of zombies. In order to reduce her fear, Hypno-shroom tells her a bedtime story every day: "Actually, there are good people among zombies." Over time, Scaredy-shroom was finally brainwashed. Now she can use spores to brainwash zombies. Of course, she is still very afraid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Trippy-shroom can fire spores in 7 colors.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Randomly fires 1 of 7 types of spores. When a zombie is hit by all 7 types of spores, it will be charmed. Each time it is hit by a type of spore, the charm probability of the Perfume-shroom will increase.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypno-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Magiting
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Courage fills me, no fear remains~ Whether it's spring, fall, winter, or summer~" Gutsy-shroom no longer shrinks in the face of zombies. "I used to tremble, but Senior Fume-shroom told me, 'If a zombie gets near, spray your spores. Hiding won't solve anything.'"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gutsy-shroom is ready to take on the zombies, near or far!

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>When zombies get close by 3 tiles, they will spray piercing fumes instead.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Golami
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Charm-shroom speaks with a soft smile, "Each spore carries my love, and when they bloom, it's like a spring breeze caressing the air." She even twisted her head into a heart to express her feelings. Her eyes shine with sincerity, hoping that maybe, just maybe, the zombies will understand her love.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Charm-shroom can fire explosive Charm spores.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>80 / 1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>40 splash damage in a 1x1.5 grid. Has a chance to charm zombies with < 50% HP.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Tangkad Mani
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"The taller you are, the more powerful you become." Tall-nut firmly believed in this, which is why he always stayed on the front line. Other plants would urge him to take it easy, but he'd just smile and say, "It's fine, I'm tall. As long as you fight quickly, the zombies won't have time to eat all of me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that can't be vaulted or jumped over.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color></size>

plants.name: Maning Ragbi
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Rugby-nut looked fierce, causing some small plants that didn't know the truth to feel scared by his appearance. However, the plants that understood Rugby-nut knew that beneath his serious exterior lay a strong determination to protect his companions. The stolen helmet undoubtedly boosted his confidence.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Rugby-nut is able to hold a huge amount of damage.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can be fed metal objects to restore 500 HP.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Tall-nut + Rugby Helmet</color></size>

plants.name: ManiToro
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants hold conflicting feelings about Buck-nut. As an exemplary soldier, he executes orders with unwavering precision, yet his cold demeanor leaves much to be desired. The rust at the corners of his mouth hints at a storied past. In the quiet moments, however, Buck-nut wrestles with an unspoken worry: "How do I prevent rust in a humid garden?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blocks the zombies' advance with a wall of iron.

<color=black>Resistensya: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Can be fed metal objects to restore 500 HP. This also applies to other Metallic Plants.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Bucket</color></size>

plants.name: Dobleng Buto-Bato
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Unlike his bright and cheerful brother, Repeater leads a carefree life—until it's time to fight. He secretly mastered the art of double shooting but kept it hidden from Peashooter. "I just want him to live happily, without ever needing to learn these battle skills."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Repeater fires two peas at a time.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Peashooter</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng-Araw
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Sun-shroom hates sun. He hates it so much that when it builds up in his system, he spits it out as fast as he can. He just won't abide it. To him, sun is crass.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sun-shrooms give small sun at first and normal sun later.

<color=black>Produksyon ng Araw: </color><color=#8B0000>15 (25) / 25 Segundo
<color=black>Growth Time: </color><color=#8B0000>120 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Batong Gatling
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Gatling Pea, the big brother of the Pea family, stands tall with his gun barrel, the very foundation of everyone's safety. His back is like a monument on the battlefield, admired by all. Yet, he smiles modestly, knowing that his daily life is actually managed by his younger brother, Peashooter. "I can't live without him," he admits quietly.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gatling Pea shoots four peas at a time.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Split Pea + Peashooter</color></size>

plants.name: Kambal-Mirasol
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The Twin Sunflower are known as sisters, always working behind the scenes rather than on the battlefield's front lines. Their role is to support everyone from the rear, but make no mistake—you must protect them. If they're harmed, many plants will quietly shed tears.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.

<color=black>Produksyon ng Araw: </color><color=#8B0000>25*2/20 Segundo</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Nyebeng-Buto
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The cold-blooded Snow Pea rarely displays his emotions to other plants. Some say his heart is even colder than the frozen peas he fires. Snow Pea doesn't want to come off that way, but every time he opens his mouth, the bullets he launches plunge the atmosphere around him to freezing temperatures.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Snow Peas shoot frozen peas that damage and slow the enemy.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each bullet will add 10 Cryo Points.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Icicle-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>The Icicle-shrooms didn't set out to master refrigeration technology. During a hiking trip, they forgot their quilts and spent an entire night frozen atop a mountain, frost forming on their heads. Later, Snow Pea, captivated by their frosty appearance, gifted them some icicles to complement their new look.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Icicle-shroom fires icicles that slow down enemies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Adds 5 Cryo Points for every icicle hit. Pierce 3 times. Each icicle will deal 4 times more damage to a frozen zombie.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Snow Pea (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Mini Ice-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Smaller in size, same big abilities!" Mini Ice-shroom's signature poker face never cracks as he delivers his jokes, and that might just be why zombies freeze on the spot.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mini Ice-shroom can temporarily freeze zombies they come into contact with.

<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Freezes zombies that eat it in place.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Ice-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuting Nagyelo
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Frost-shroom stands out among the Fume-shrooms. His study abroad in the freezing Alaskan wilderness made him even cooler—literally. Though he only studied hair design for a few years, he's pretty proud of it.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Frost-shroom's fumes can pass through and freeze zombies.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo (Piercing) </color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000> Will add 5 Cryo Points after each attack.</color>
<color=black>Pormula ng Pagsasanib: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kabuteng Ginawin
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Shivery-shroom believes he stands apart from other scaredy-shrooms. Unlike them, he never shrinks in fear and joins in all activities without hesitation. However, that's only because when he gets scared, the air around him plummets in temperature, leaving everyone too afraid to startle him.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shivery-shroom fires freezing spores.

<color=black>Pinsala: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Segundo</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>10 Cryo Points per attack.</color>
<color=black>Kakayahan: </color><color=#8B0000>Freeze nearby zombies when they get near.</color>
